TopicTitle: Make a multi part space station

Articles.Content:
theoretically this is possible but i\'d imagine it\'s very hard

basically make a huge space station but first have a core and then carry the rest of the parts up

separately to make a giant space station out of several parts. Use mods if you must

Update: I saw this which will help signifficantly:

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/showthread.php/20503-0-16-Erkle-Mods-Warp-Capable-Docking-Clamp

(take screenshots)

Edited September 15, 2012 by midgester222
This is a Very hard challenge. How are we meant to connect parts?
With landing legs. Even so, this won\'t work with the drift.

With Damned Robotics claws it is theoretically possible to have a base, and grab onto various other parts that you carry up. Just damn impossible. I\'m on my laptop right now (which can barely even launch the game, much less launch a complex rocket into space.). When I get home, I will demonstrate this with a simple base and a single 'module' launched seperately on a youtube video (or series of screenshots if I get lazy).
